Omni 2 Is Exclusively Available on Amazon
product_description: The Samsonite Omni 2 Luggage is a meticulously engineered suitcase designed to optimize the modern traveler's journey. Crafted with precision, this luggage with wheels epitomizes sophistication and functionality, catering to those seeking effortless travel experiences. A 24-inch spacious interior makes it convenient and practical for packing. With exterior dimensions of 26.5 x 16.5 x 11 inches including the wheels, this medium checked luggage is airline-approved. Our hard case suitcase with spinner wheels facilitates fluid movement through bustling concourses and urban environments thanks to four multi-directional oversized dual-spinner wheels. The re-engineered lightweight construction further enhances effortless mobility. With durability in mind, the scratch-resistant polycarb brushed-texture shell serves as a shield against the rigors of traveling with a rolling suitcase, preserving its pristine appearance journey after journey. Backed by a 10-year limited warranty, it exemplifies longevity and reliability. Within its polished exterior lies a meticulously organized interior. Elastic tie-down straps, a lining pocket for small items, and a zipped mesh divider to arrange your belongings, you'll find efficiency and accessibility with this spacious luggage. Catering to the needs of the modern nomad, our luggage integrates a built-in charging system. Compatible with various battery types, it facilitates uninterrupted connectivity, empowering travelers to remain engaged and productive. Elevate your travel experience with the Omni 2 Luggage by Samsonite—a synergy of form and function. Embrace the epitome of sophistication and efficiency, and embark on a journey where every detail is meticulously curated for your utmost convenience and satisfaction.
